name: Elemental Adventure (itch)
description:
WASD - Move Character
1,2,3,4 - Switch Character (once unlocked)
Space - Action
Shift - Interact/Dialogue

Your friends, your treasures, and your snacks are all gone! Scattered about on this mysterious island and you've got to find them!

Once you find your friends, work together and find ways to traverse the island that you previously couldn't. Knowing the best time to use your party members is key to surviving the dangerous challenges of the island!

Known issues (can't post a fix until the voting is over):
-New Game button doesn't work a second time, just refresh the page if you want to start a new game.
-No clear indication as to how long flying lasts, flying lasts 5 seconds with a 5 second cooldown
-Some zones may have frame drops due to high particle count
-One zone has no collision checks with the ground... really dunno how I missed that xP
